# ISingleStoreConnectorLogger.IsEnabled method

Returns `true` if logging for this logger is enabled at the specified level.

```csharp
public bool IsEnabled(SingleStoreConnectorLogLevel level)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| level | The log level. |

## Return Value

`true` if logging is enabled; otherwise, `false`.
